    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_102971</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Un graphique vierge</string>
            <string language="en">A blank line graph</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Leerzeile Diagramm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma linha gráfico em branco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Grafico lineare in bianco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια κενή γραφική παράσταση γραμμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una línea gráfico en blanco</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce graphique vierge montrera la variation de l'intensité de la lumière d'un objet particulier comme le mur ou de  l'arbre dans un habitat témoin.</string>
            <string language="en">This blank line graph will show the variation of light intensity from a particular object like wall or tree in a sample habitat.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">adaptation</string>
            <string language="en">adaptation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">habitat</string>
            <string language="en">habitat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">énergie de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">intensité de la  lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light intensity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">choses vivantes</string>
            <string language="en">living things</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Leerzeile Diagramm zeigt die Variante der 
Lichtintensität von einer bestimmten Nachricht wie Wand oder vom Baum
in einem Beispiellebensraum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico em branco mostrará a 
variação da intensidade clara de um objeto particular como a parede 
ou da árvore em um habitat da amostra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare in bianco mostrerà la 
variazione di intensità della luce della luce da un oggetto 
particolare come la parete o dall'albero in un habitat del campione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η κενή γραφική παράσταση γραμμών θα εμφανίσει 
την παραλλαγή της ελαφριάς έντασης από ένα ιδιαίτερο 
αντικείμενο όπως τον τοίχο ή το δέντρο σε έναν βιότοπο 
δειγμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico en blanco mostrará la 
variación de la intensidad de luz de un objeto determinado como la 
pared o del árbol en un habitat de la muestra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anpassung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebensraum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtintensität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">lebende Sachen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">adaptação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">habitat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia clara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">intensidade clara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">coisas vivas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">adattamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">habitat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
